front.title: Alias algorithm identifier assignment mechanism for DNSSEC

abstract.t: DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) has been developed to provide originauthentication and integrity protection for DNS data by using digitalsignatures. The DNSKEY, RRSIG, and DS RRs use an 8-bit number toidentify the security algorithm being used. More and more newRRTYPEs will appear in future. This document defines an aliasalgorithm identifier assignment method for DNSSEC 8-bit algorithmnumbers.
